sentences.en: "And the big thing that made a difference in the ability to find that out was the genome sequence of the aphid was completed recently, " she says.
sentences.cn: “最近完成的蚜虫基因组序列计划是一件大事情，它让我们的研究能力获得极大提高，”她说。

sentences.en: Anyway, Moran sat down at her computer and looked through the aphid genome for the genes that are responsible for carotenoids.
sentences.cn: 无论你听说过没有，现在，莫兰正坐在她的电脑前，研究蚜虫基因组的资料，查找负责类胡萝卜素的基因。

sentences.en: Aphid count on plants in fields do not correlate with virus spread in the same fields.
sentences.cn: 田间植株蚜数与同块田内病毒的扩散程度间无相关性.

sentences.en: CTV and its efficient vector, brown citrus aphid ( Toxoptera citricida Kirkaldy ), are widely distributed in China.
sentences.cn: 在我国,CTV及其强力传媒褐色橘蚜 ( ToxopteracitricidaKirkaldy ) 广泛分布.

sentences.en: Figure 1 . Symptoms on melon plants infected with cucurbit aphid - borne yellows virus ( CABYV ).
sentences.cn: 图一、甜瓜受瓜类蚜媒黄化病毒 ( CABYV ) 感染呈现之病徵.

sentences.en: He used aphid fecundity data to elucidate the theoretical effects of antibiosis on insect population dynamics.
sentences.cn: 他利用蚜虫繁殖力资料说明了抗生作用对虫口动态的理论效应.

sentences.en: In general an aphid cannot or hardly identify its host at a distance.
sentences.cn: 在一定距离以外,蚜虫通常不能或难以识别其寄主植物.

sentences.en: In which Aphid and leaflike are the dominant insects in spring.
sentences.cn: 其中蚜虫、叶螨是春季昆虫群落的优势种.

sentences.en: Since aphid population may become resistant to organophosphorus compounds, avoid excessive spraying.
sentences.cn: 因为蚜虫类对有机磷化物能产生抗性, 所以要避免过多的喷洒.

sentences.en: The aphid eat green grass, the false eats soul.
sentences.cn: 蚜虫吃青草, 虚伪吃灵魂.

sentences.en: The aphid is now laying waste to the wheat and barley fields.
sentences.cn: 蚜虫正在毁掉一片片的小麦和大麦田地。

sentences.en: The five small arthropod were still very serious pest, especially aphid, scale and whitefly.
sentences.cn: 其中,五小害虫的危害仍然非常严重, 尤其是蚜虫 、 蚧壳虫和粉虱.

sentences.en: The possible causes of the formation of aphid host bio types were reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述了蚜虫寄主专化型产生的可能原因.

sentences.en: The reproduction rate of teh aphid is influenced by nutrition.
sentences.cn: 蚜虫的繁殖率受到营养的影响.

sentences.en: The woolly aphid has a lanate coat resembling cotton.
sentences.cn: 棉蚜虫有一层羊毛状的表皮,很像一团棉花.

sentences.en: There is adequate variability in plants to breed for resistance to certain aphid vectors.
sentences.cn: 植物有充分的变异性可用于培育对一些蚜虫介体的抗性.

sentences.en: This paper studies composition and characters of the aphid fauna of Hengduan Mountains Region.
sentences.cn: 研究了横断山区蚜虫区系的组成和特点.

trans.tran_en: a type of small insect that feeds on the juices of plants
